üì± Current @gaby inspired Home Screen.
 iPhone Home Screen with small widget stack in the top left corner. Starting from top right corner and reading left to right, apps are: Ulysses, Notes, Reeder, Drafts, Toot!, Glass, Apollo, Discord, Micro.blog, Epilogue, Mimi, Pocket Casts. Wallpaper is a dark space theme, with a blueish tinted and haloed moon.
